history.proof: intros d a s H. unfold coacc_transitive_def. intros H0 H1. intros. auto.

original: intros d a s H. unfold coacc_transitive_def. intros H0 H1. intros a0 H2 H3. apply coacc_nxt with (s1 := s) (c := a). - auto. - eapply coacc_id. eauto. - eauto. - auto. - apply H0 with (a2 := a0). + eapply coacc_id. eauto. + auto.
